title: Software Engineer
description: Responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining software applications. Collaborates with cross-functional teams to define, develop, and test new features, ensuring high performance and responsiveness.

title: Data Scientist
description: Analyzes complex datasets to extract insights and build predictive models. Works closely with business teams to inform strategic decisions and optimize processes through data-driven approaches.

title: Product Manager
description: Oversees product lifecycle from conception to launch. Works with engineering, design, and marketing teams to deliver a product that meets market demands and aligns with business goals.
